writingSemanticHtml.description: Semantic element clearly describes its meaning to both the browser and the developer. In HTML, semantic element are the type of elements that can be used to define different parts of a web page such as <form>, <table>, <article>, <header>, <footer>, etc.Visit the following resources to learn more:

resources.name: HTML Best Practices - How to Build a Better HTML-Based Website
Semantic HTML: What It Is and How It Improves Your Site

questions.question: What does the HTML <main> tag represent?
questions.description: Understand the purpose of the HTML <main> tag in marking the main content of a document.
questions.hint: Consider the element used for marking the main content of a document in HTML.

options.label: A
options.description: To create a hyperlink.
options.explanation: Incorrect. The <main> tag is not used for creating hyperlinks; its purpose is to mark the main content of a document.

options.label: B
options.description: To indicate superscript text.
options.explanation: Incorrect. The <main> tag is not used for indicating superscript text; its purpose is to mark the main content of a document.

options.label: C
options.description: To mark the main content of a document.
options.explanation: Correct! The <main> tag is used to mark the main content of a document in HTML.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the HTML <article> tag?
questions.description: Understand the role of the HTML <article> tag in marking up independent, self-contained content.
questions.hint: Consider the element used for marking up content that can be distributed and reused independently.

options.label: A
options.description: To define a block of text from another source.
options.explanation: Incorrect. The <article> tag is not used for defining blocks of text from another source; its purpose is to mark up independent, self-contained content.

options.label: B
options.description: To indicate superscript text.
options.explanation: Incorrect. The <article> tag is not used for indicating superscript text; its purpose is to mark up independent, self-contained content.

options.label: C
options.description: To mark up independent, self-contained content.
options.explanation: Correct! The <article> tag is used to mark up content that can be distributed and reused independently in HTML.
